description: Signifies Esrp state change
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDomainStateChange EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnName s EXAMPLE EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnGroup i 0 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnState i 0 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnNetAddress a 192.0.2.1 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnMasterMacAddress s EXAMPL EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnActivePorts i 9999 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnInternalActivePorts i 9999 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnTrackedActivePorts i 9999 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnTrackedIpRoutes i 9999 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnTrackedPings i 9999 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnActivePortWeight i 9999 EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnTrackedActivePortWeight i 9999

description: A unique name assigned to ESRP Domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnName

description: Identifier to pair ESRP routers with in a ESRP domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnGroup

description: This indicates the ESRP state of this ESRP router.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnState

description: Indicates a gateway addresses this router backs
up. Any gateway address can be backed up by 2 routers
with one as the master and other as backup.
This entry is null if no address has been assigned to
the master vlan of this domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnNetAddress

description: MAC address of Master ESRP router.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnMasterMacAddress

description: The number of active vlan-ports that are part of this
ESRP domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnActivePorts

description: The number of internal active ports that are part of
this ESRP domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnInternalActivePorts

description: The total number of vlan-ports belonging to the vlans
that are tracked by this ESRP domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnTrackedActivePorts

description: The total number of ip routes that are tracked
by this ESRP domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnTrackedIpRoutes

description: The total number of ip addresses that are ping-tracked
by this ESRP domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnTrackedPings

description: The normalised link-weight of active vlan-ports that
are part of this ESRP domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnActivePortWeight

description: The normalised link-weight of active vlan-ports that
are tracked by this ESRP domain.
variables.name: EXTREME-ESRP-MIB::extremeEsrpDmnTrackedActivePortWeight
